TopicTitle: KSP crashes after reverting to the VAB or to the launch

Articles.Content:
Greetings,

since a few days now a have this annoying problem with my KSP install, it always crashes (without an Error message or something) , when I am reverting the flights or even recover them after a mission  

I don´t know how to solve this problem and I have tried reinstalling it multiple times now and also checked the files through Steam.

My installed Mods are :

Mechjeb 2 ; Tantares and Tantares LV ; Texture Replacer ; BDB dev version ; Tundra Exploration ; Kerbal Reusability Expansion ; Modular Launch Pads ; KNES ; reDirect and Benjee10 Shuttle orbiter.

Log File :

https://www.dropbox.com/s/zrkk2a4so4ck1uq/Player.log?dl=0

 

Thank´s for your help
